type Session struct {
	opts *sessionOptions

	ctx *Context

	localNonces *Nonces

	pubNonces [][PubNonceSize]byte

	combinedNonce *[PubNonceSize]byte

	msg [32]byte

	ourSig *PartialSignature
	sigs   []*PartialSignature

	finalSig *schnorr.Signature
}
